meanings.definition: At an inconvenient or inappropriate time.
meanings.sent1: She arrived inopportunely during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The cat inopportunely knocked over the vase during the important call.
meanings.sent4: The rain started inopportunely just as we were about to leave.
meanings.sent5: The alarm clock went off inopportunely, causing her to oversleep.

meanings.definition: In a manner that is not well-timed or suitable.
meanings.sent1: He inopportunely chose to wear shorts on the coldest day of the year.
meanings.sent2: She inopportunely forgot her umbrella on a rainy day.
meanings.sent3: The clown inopportunely slipped on a banana peel during his performance.
meanings.sent4: The car inopportunely broke down in the middle of nowhere.
meanings.sent5: The fire alarm rang inopportunely, causing chaos in the building.
